channel.title: Spring JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPR-4923] NPE in AbstractCachingLabeledEnumResolver during namespace parsing
item.description:
This is using version of 2.5.5 from CVS

item.summary: NPE in AbstractCachingLabeledEnumResolver during namespace parsing

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I've revised our AbstractCachingLabeledEnumResolver and its CachingMapDecorator delegate to always return a created value straight away, with only the cached value wrapped in a WeakReference. Previously we used a WeakReference even for returning from the get call, which introduces a race condition if the garbage collector kicks in before get returns.

This will be available in tonight's 2.5.5 snapshot. However, it hasn't been tested in OSGi environments yet. I'll ask Costin as well but of course it would be great if you could test it in your full integration environment.

Juergen
